    1. selectCourier(List, Order)

Interface DeliveryPolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
FairOccupationPolicy, FastestDeliveryPolicy
public interface DeliveryPolicy
Interface defining the strategy for selecting a courier for delivery. Different implementations can use different algorithms to choose the most appropriate courier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Courier
    selectCourier(List<Courier> couriers, Order order)
    Selects the most appropriate courier for an order based on the policy's criteria.

  • Method Details

    • selectCourier

      Courier selectCourier(List<Courier> couriers, Order order)
      Selects the most appropriate courier for an order based on the policy's criteria.
      Parameters:
      couriers - List of available couriers
      order - The order to be delivered
      Returns:
      The selected courier, or null if no suitable courier is found
